Object that allocates room on the stack or on the heap depending on the size. More...

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

  • StackOrHeap (int size)
    Creates internal buffer if there is a need. Otherwise stack.
  • ~StackOrHeap ()
    Deletes the internal buffer if there is one.

Detailed Description

template<int stacksize, class T>
class StackOrHeap< stacksize, T >

Object that allocates room on the stack or on the heap depending on the size.

Will be quick if the size is within the stacksize.
